 the

Also, I am more than willing on a one on one email basis, to discuss
wi=
th each person what they may be interested in tackling - everyone
has a par=
ticular niche of thier own that they have a great deal of
knowledge about, =
and I'm interested in tapping that.  I am equipped to

nd recomending sources, and I have the insanely
immense University of Hawai=
i's Japanese history section at my
disposal.  And no one should worry about=
